description: An empty search should return all products

testName: Test search with a single character
description: A search for a single character 'a' should return all matching results

testName: Test maximum valid search term (50 chars)
description: A search with the maximum allowed length should return no results
A search term exceeding the maximum length should return no results
Special characters not present in any product name should return no matches
Should return all products with the keyword 'Hammer' in their name
Should return all products with the keyword 'Wrench' in their name
A case-insensitive match for the keyword 'drill' should return all drills
A case-insensitive match for the uppercase keyword 'SAW' should find all saws
A partial keyword 'Screw' should return all screwdrivers

testName: Search with a keyword not in any product
description: Should return 0 for a term not present in any product name
A search should match substrings, e.g., 'sand' in 'sander'
